author.particle: the P.S.U.C.) had descended on the

note: against the C.N.T. – but not (here is the difference) because the Catalan workers were giving trouble, but because the Communists wished to weaken them before destroying them.
title: Things had grown worse since the factories had been militarized by the decree of August , i.e. after Prieto had left the Government. Obviously the old triangle of Castile – Catalonia – and the Castilian party in Catalonia was reasserting itself in a new form. Just as Madrid had used the Radicals against the Lliga, and the Sindicato Libre against the C.N.T., and the Lliga against the Esquerra, and the F.A.I. and the Esquerra against one another, so the Valencia Government was now using the P.S.U.C
